feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.6: Helm Charts, Safeties & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add helm lint action (#1589) Thanks @MindTooth!
  • Fix New Contributor Greeting (#2253) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Adjust helm chart to runAsNonRoot (#2252) Thanks @domi2120!
  • Add Locale Safety (#2259) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump high_voltage from 3.1.2 to 4.0.0 (#2198) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump stringio from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 (#2258) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erubi from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0 (#2257) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.5 to 1.16.6 (#2256) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.152.2 to 1.152.3 (#2254) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@MindTooth, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @domi2120 and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.41.6

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website

  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.8: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-performance from 1.21.0 to 1.21.1 (#2263) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump azure/setup-helm from 3 to 4 (#2267) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump docker/build-push-action from 5 to 6 (#2272) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actions/setup-python from 4 to 5 (#2268) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.197.0 to 3.197.1 (#2279) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest-reporters from 1.6.1 to 1.7.1 (#2281) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.23.1 to 5.24.0 (#2280) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump pry-rails from 0.3.9 to 0.3.11 (#2277) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump jwt from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2 (#2276) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump memory_profiler from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 (#2275) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump public_suffix from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 (#2274) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.84.0 to 1.85.0 (#2273) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.11.0 to 2.12.0 (#2271) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump helm/kind-action from 1.8.0 to 1.10.0 (#2270) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump helm/chart-testing-action from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 (#2269) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.6.15 to 2.6.16 (#2266) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.12 to 0.4.13 (#2265) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.13.1 to 1.13.2 (#2264) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump public_suffix from 5.0.5 to 5.1.0 (#2262) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.9: 1-click Retrieval Step: Immediate Expired Message
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • 1-click: Immediately show expired message if push is expired (#2285) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.12.0 to 2.13.0 (#2291) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.13 to 0.4.14 (#2290) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 (#2289) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.37.0 to 1.38.0 (#2286) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.197.1 to 3.197.2 (#2284) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.10: Add Slovak Language Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add Slovenský Language Support (#2306) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates
